oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Jr. Show at Hasan Shrine Temple
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, Jr., 1949-; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011; Williams, Audrey, 1923-1975; Fox, Curly, 1910-1995; Montgomery, Melba;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Three color half sheet (blue and red on yellow) announcing the Hank Williams Jr. Show with Hank Williams Jr., Charlie Louvin, Audrey Williams, Curley Fox, Melba Montgomery and Lamar Morris at the Hasan Shrine Temple on October 1. Poster features metal photoplates of Hank Williams Jr., Audrey Williams, Charlie Louvin, Lamar Morris, Curley Fox, and Melba Montgomery.
